citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 pm on 08-
JUNE-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home
and would not be available for inspection. Licensee was also called and it was confirmed that they would not be available
for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 pm on 08-
JUNE-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home 
and would not be available for inspection. Licensee was also called and it was confirmed that they would not be available 
for inspection. 
 
 
End Section
